short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension can save and reload multi-window, multi-tab sessions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SessionSaver is a simple Google Chrome Extension that allows for quick saving and quick loading of a browsing session. This boost productivity for window/tab heavy users who need a way to jump on and off their browsing sessions.
